title: Can't download patch 6.9
body: Since the new patch came out the client point blank wont update on EUW. If i change to NA it gets to 32% then crashes giving me this screen every time http://puu.sh/oFQPc/7de4a76ee2.jpg. I would really rather not redownload and reinstall the game.

replies.body:
Same problem, Riot someone fix this please
It reads 3000files+ and doesn t stop

Do you happen to have Avast?  We've noticed some trends in it affecting the ability to patch.  If so, take a look at the [Firewall section](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq7) of our Patching Issues article for more information on how to disable it for patching.  You can also look at adding an exception for League of Legends to Avast as well.  Avast should have more information on how to add exceptions.

I've got the same problem here in EUW.
Yesterday after trying 3-4 times in a row it got to 88% and then gave the error message. The other time i made it to 99% and then it showed me the error message, really annoying ive already send a bug splat message to riot but havent gotten a reply since.
This afternoon ive been trying to get it to work but without anny succes, at 33% it sends the error message and there is nothing i can do. Really anoying if you ask me , please fix this quickly?
Owh it just got fixed here! goodluck guys! idk what riot did but it helped xd

Hey Flesher,

Can you try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Patching Issues**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) thread and let me know if anything works for you? Thanks!

>
> Hey Flesher,
>

Im having the same issue. I disabled firewall, ran as admin, reinstalled, and it wont let me delete the lol_game_client_sln file or any file, keeps saying i need permission, even though im running admin.

> [{quoted}](name=zenoogafoo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Io1AuNFu,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-05-05T04:11:18.729+0000)
>
> Im having the same issue. I disabled firewall, ran as admin, reinstalled, and it wont let me delete the lol_game_client_sln file or any file, keeps saying i need permission, even though im running admin.

Have you tried restarting your computer and then trying to delete the folder after reboot?
Having the same problem.. Looked on all fora and stuff but still can't find a solution.. Re-installed, restarted pc, unabled firewall and antivirus, everything.. Nothing works
same, this is annoying ass hell too

> [{quoted}](name=Tripleliftt,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Io1AuNFu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-05-04T18:40:38.187+0000)
>
> same, this is annoying ass hell too

I replied to the original post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Io1AuNFu-cant-download-patch-69?comment=0005). Can you try the solutions in the thread I linked and let me know if that resolves your issues?

Happening here too on NA.  Riot has a disastrous patching record.  Every two or three patches this exact same problem seems to happen, and no one has an answer for it for a couple of days.  This happened to me on patch 6.7 and I couldn't get a legitimate answer or fix for over a week..A WEEK.  Let's hope it's not that bad this time but I wouldn't hold my breath.

I got 99% and got the same error message as in OP's picture. Dear God please don't make me uninstall and reinstall the entire freaking game..AGAIN!

I get to 32% with  almost  every patch. Its bad to the point where I have to re-install league every 2 patches or so or it will scan files to like 20k or just infinity. I also dont  see any fixes for it, so thats AWESOME!!
I'm on na and i crash and got this pop up as well. now im just sitting at 33% while my files slowly scan...
I am getting the same error - I have disabled all antivirus with no improvement
